column3: Concept ACK, but indeed adding the id to CNodeState is not necessary.\n
@rebroad can you please process the comments here so that it can be merged?\n
Closing this, it seems inactive. The idea of adding the logging is good but it introduces unnecessary state and should be solved differently.\n
No need to add id to state, as CNodeState is exactly indexed by NodeId already (meaning you won't ever have a CNodeState without knowing its NodeId); specifically, pnode here contains the NodeId.\n
